class ATAR_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='ATAR', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        self.schemas['ATAR'] = [
                                ['BKID', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                ['SchoolId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                ['Year', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                ['LUI', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                ['Given Name', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                ['Family Name', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                ['ATAR', 'string', 'no-op']                              
                                ]

                                 

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'ATAR', self.schemas['ATAR'], None, 'BKID')

atar_object = ATAR_object()
